p.d: To open the programme's second season Corey and Evelyne head off to Portland on the trail of the original food trucks. Corey tastes Nong's khao man gai, a legendary Thai dish, and Evelyne learns to prepare a daikon salad with the owner of the Kim Jong Grillin food truck. Presented by: Evelyne Charuest, Corey Loranger.
